channel.title: Need help with IP SERVERS plz
channel.description:
for the ip servers, arent they numbers, or can they be letters also if letters like this : RS2Gods.servegame.com for the ip servers work, plz tell me because i put them in where it says server ip, but it never works even when the forum says its online
do i put the letters in the ip server spot?
and if i am logged into hamachi, and the server doesnt run on hamachi, will that affect anything?
plz help ASAP

item.title: Need help with IP SERVERS plz
item.dc:creator: @swordslaser9 swordslaser9
item.description:
@swordslaser9 wrote:

Ok u put the ip in the ip box (it could be leteer or numbers) then if it have a portâ€¦ go to file and u see port. click on that and enter the port. then log in. if its ham u have to log into the network for ham. 1st download it. then copy the owners ip and put it in the ip boxe. and then put the port in the port thing.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with IP SERVERS plz
